Text:
Comment formatting testing

This is a test to see upload formatting options. Testing in HTML and BBcode.

test link
[url="http://test.com"]test link[/url]
[url=http://test.com]test link[/url]
[url]test link[/url]




one
two
three



one
two
three




bold
italics
underline

[hr]

[ul]
[li]one[/li]
[li]two[/li]
[li]three[/li]
[/ul]

[ol]
[li]one[/li]
[li]two[/li]
[li]three[/li]
[/ol]

[img]http://topotopologia.galeon.com/imagenes/wifi.png[/img]

[b]bold[/b]
[i]italics[/i]
[u]underline[/u]

The description field on the torrent posting pages is for plain text only.
No formatting codes are processed, so if you insert any such codes you will just make a visible mess.
URLs work best if you place them in the beginning of a separate line.
Then they'll turn blue and become clickable links.

The same applies to posting comments.
